name: Earth Invaders (New Planet Games)
description:
Welcome to Earth Invaders!

Defend Earth from the alien invasion and score as many points as you can!

Programming by Nicholas Watson and Tymon Bulawa-Sobolewski.

Artwork  by Declan Lewis.

Sound design by Declan Lewis.

Bug fixing by Nicholas Watson and Tymon Bulawa-Sobolewski.

Special thanks to Matthew Pearson for bug fixing too.

This was made as part of the UOC Game Jam 2021.
